about_the_game:
"We hold these truths to be AWESOME"

With this pack of patriotic gear, there will be no mistaking your love and loyalty to the greatest country on earth. U-S-A! U-S-A! (Contents made in China)

Contains:
- Complete set of clothing items.
- Paint job for vehicles.
